issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
apt:build rake task supports architecture to run [1], but it is not true
 for yum task.

 [1] [https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/tasks/linux-packages/package-task.rb#L276]

It is useful yum task also supports architecture (ex. i386) too. (even though CentOS 6 i386 EOL reaches 2020/11)
fields.summary: [Packaging][RPM] Add support for CentOS 7 on aarch64

comments.body: We don't build i386 packages. But adding support for aarch64. So it's acceptable to do this to add support for aarch64.
